1200.name: Unknown
1200.message:
Unable to connect to the network
because the Wii U console and another
device are using the same IP address.

Select Connect to the Internet under the
Internet option in System Settings, and
then select Connections and choose
the appropriate network. Next, select
Change Settings. Select IP Address,
and confirm that Auto-obtain has been
selected.

If the network requires a manual IP
address, select IP Address then select
Don't Auto-obtain. You will be prompted
to enter an IP address manually.
1200.short_solution: Make sure your console is in range of your Wi-Fi network, and check the settings are correct. Make sure the 'Default' connection in Internet Settings is set correctly.
